snippet: Thorsten Heins, the chief executive of Research in Motion, expressed great confidence in the new BlackBerry 10, which he says will help phone users reintegrate their work and personal lives on their smartphones.
abstract: Thorsten Heins, the chief executive of Research in Motion, expressed great confidence in the new BlackBerry 10, which he says will help phone users reintegrate their work and personal lives on their smartphones.

headline.main: RIM's Chief Is Confident of BlackBerry 10 Success
headline.print_headline:
RIM Places Bets
On New Line
Of BlackBerry
